house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1994 has 6 bedroom(s), 8 bath(s) , 4 car garage. Rooms include dining room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, private spa, patio, fireplace.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.fireplace: Family Room, Living Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings,Ceiling Fan(s), Central Vacuum, Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Game Room,Garage Door Opener, Intercom System, Kitchen Island, Microwave,Pantry, Wet Bar
